Text: I downloaded this within a span of 45 minutes. Little did I know was that it was "not supported" as it's not a "movie format". Therefore, this is not legit.
It is an avi file, it works and is good quality but in russian no subs
@ DexterIdolizer.......download vlc media player do a google search for it its free!! NEVER PLAY DOWNLOADED MOVIES IN WINDOWS MEDIA PLAYER!!!!

As Barron says, you must try VLC or another media player. Sometimes only one will work. Three good ones to have are:  

VLC

KMPlayer

Media Player Classic Home Cinema (sometimes works when the first two don't)

Hope this helps!
